snippet.title: Farm Frenzy: Refreshed - PC Gameplay
snippet.description:
Slip into a pair of overalls and give us your best "Yee-haw!".

From feeding feisty animals to gathering fresh eggs to making delicious pastries, you'll turn a humble little homestead into a booming agribusiness. You'll have to stay on your sun-kissed toes, though. As you race to meet your goals on each level, ravenous bears and other animals will try to foil your efforts. But don't worry; you'll have the tools you need to deal with each of these beastly brutes. From sunup to sundown, Farm Frenzy is crazy, captivating fun!

Farm Frenzy: Refreshed (C) Alawar Entertainment
Developed by GameOn Production
Also released on: Steam, PlayStation 4, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch

#farmfrenzy #farmfrenzyrefreshed #alawar #alawarentertainment #casualgames #bigfish #bigfishgames
